Name: Jayse Hansen
Comment: The up arrow doesn't work as well. It requires another hand on the keyboard. The esc key is much better. This is how XD works as well and for good reason. Your right hand is on the mouse. Your left hand is free to hit esc. Please add this as an option or addition. Thanks!

Comment: You can do this by pressing the up key on your keyboard. Maybe webflow can let us edit keyboard shortcuts one day.
